info.title: Meme Generator
info.description: A simple meme generator that generates memes by choosing a preloaded images, and short top and bottom text sentences. Memes are served in the JPEG image file format.

get.description: Simple meme generator that uses a predefined set of images.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.description: The text to write at the bottom of the image.

parameters.name: font
parameters.description: The font used to generate the text

parameters.name: font_size
parameters.description: Override the font size used instead of trying to fit the text into a line

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The text to write at the top of the image.
